name: Box Shake
description:
Box Shake is a difficult and gripping game of skill. There are many different levels, which consist of balls and blocks in boxes. The goal is to collect all the blue blocks with the balls, but without touching a red block. The game is based on Broken Breakout by Tim Garbos but with extra features. There are collectable stars and a time limit that can be beaten individually for each level. In addition, each level in a section can be played in a harder version after all levels of the section have been won.

There are currently 30 levels in 2 sections, 70 more levels in 5 more sections are in progress. Gamepad is supported in the Mac and Windows build.

Feedback is greatly appreciated.
